name: Farmers & Growers
overview: Vaigo empowers farmers to transition from reactive to proactive farming. Our AI-based insights help optimize water usage, improve crop health, and increase yield with real-time data from satellite imagery and field sensors.
challenges: Unpredictable weather patterns and water scarcity.
Lack of real-time visibility into crop performance.
Inconsistent yield and quality across seasons.
solutions: Dynamic Nutrient Deficiency Alerts (NDVI, NDRE).
Weather-risk assessment and mitigation planning.
Optimized variable rate irrigation and fertilizer models.
Integrated yield prediction with early disease detection.
benefits: Up to 30% increase in average farm yield.
50% reduction in irrigation waste.
Real-time access to actionable crop insights.
Improved sustainability and profitability for smallholders.
cta: Harness satellite analytics and AI-powered insights to make smarter, faster farming decisions.
description: Transitioning farmers from reactive to proactive farming using AI-based predictive intelligence.

name: Agri-Finance & Insurance
overview: Vaigo enables accurate underwriting, claim validation, and portfolio monitoring for banks and insurers. With satellite-driven insights, financial institutions can assess agricultural risks in near real-time.
challenges: Difficulty assessing crop loss remotely.
High risk of fraudulent insurance claims.
Lack of visibility into large loan portfolios.
solutions: Automated event detection (drought, flood, fire).
Accurate yield estimation and pre-harvest reports.
Portfolio-level crop health and anomaly monitoring.
Independent satellite verification for claims.
benefits: Reduce claim verification costs by 40%.
Increase underwriting accuracy and transparency.
Faster payouts with automated validation.
Build trust and reliability with farmer clients.
cta: Turn agricultural risk into opportunity with Vaigo’s precision analytics platform.
description: Enabling accurate underwriting, claim validation, and portfolio monitoring for banks and insurers.
